properties.name: North Brooklyn Angels - Mobile Soup Kitchen
properties.notes:
- MONDAY’s Community Meal In Greenpoint: 862 Manhattan Avenue
    - The truck is parked in front of the steps of the St Anthony of Padua-St. Alphonsus church at the intersection of Manhattan Avenue and Milton Street.
- TUESDAY’s Community Meal on the Southside: 240 Division Avenue
    - The truck is parked across the street from the Williamsburgh Library on the Division Avenue Overpass, between Marcy Ave & Rodney Street.
- WEDNESDAY’s Community Meal In East Williamsburg/Bushwick: 195 Maujer Street
    - The truck is parked in front of St. John the Evangelist Lutheran Church, across the street from the Williamsburg Houses
- THURSDAY’s Community Meal in Greenpoint: Cooper Park Houses
    - The truck is parked in front of the playground at the intersection of Jackson Street and Debevoise Avenue.
- FRIDAY’s Community Meal in Bushwick & the Northside: 
    - 157 Johnson Ave: The truck is parked on Johnson Ave outside the Most Holy Trinity parking lot.
    - 1 Havemeyer Ave: A meal is served from our community kitchen
- Monday, Wednesday, Friday, deliver food to seniors

properties.name: The Red Door Place (Hope for Our Neighbors in Need) - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes:
'- There is an app required to make an appointment at the food pantry. It's called Plentiful.
- Plentiful is free, and can be downloaded on your phone. You will need to fill out basic info (you do not have to prove income or status,) 
- After basic info is entered, search for the Red Door Place and make a reservation. Make one when it's convenient for you, and come 5 mins before with the appointment confirmation on your phone.

properties.notes:
- Anyone is welcome, open-door policy
- Meals prepared and delivered to people experiencing homelessness
- ID is required via the Plentiful app

properties.name: Salvation Army, Harlem Temple Corps - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes: - Open to everyone

properties.name: Community Impact - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes:
- Located in the basement
- Dine in or grab & go options available
- Serving until food runs out

properties.name: Church of the Epiphany
properties.notes:
'- Serving grab-and-go meals
- Senior program (60+) occurs on Saturdays from 12:00-1:00PM

properties.name: Christ United Methodist Church
properties.notes: -   Serving grab-and-go meals

properties.name: Christ and St. Stephen's Church - Brown Bag Program
properties.notes:
- Serving grab-and-go meals
- Food donations: non-perishables preferred
- Every MLK Day, hot lunches are served sit-down style

properties.name: All Souls Church - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes: -   Vegetarian meals offered

properties.name: Food Bank for New York City - Community Kitchen
properties.notes:
- Open for visitors of all ages
- Serving to-go meals only, pickup at the door 
- 2 meals per person

properties.name: St. John's Bread & Life, Lexington - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes: - Serving breakfast and lunch grab-and-go bags from 9am-12pm

properties.name: Salvation Army, Bushwick Corps - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes: - Serving to-go meals

properties.name: Neighbors Together
properties.notes: - On Fridays, dinner served to-go during lunch service

properties.name: Calvary UFW Baptist Church - Soup Kitchen
properties.notes: - Starts at 9AM and closes when food runs out
